entry.title: Java: using BigDecimal instead of double
entry.summary: For the last two months I’ve been using Linux and Java exclusively. For the times I still need to do .NET development, my laptop is setup to dual-boot into Windows 7. But since I’m learning a lot, I really want to try and catalog my experience of transitioning

entry.title: Eclipse CHE Cloud IDE: Setup and First Thoughts
entry.summary:
Just saw an announcement for Eclipse CHE beta last night. Currently I’m more of an IntelliJ fan and I was even excited to hear about the development of an IntelliJ-based IDE for .NET (Project Rider).
